description: A front-end website built for an AI platform showcasing various AI products and services.
requirements: Design and implement a clean and intuitive interface for the AI platform, providing product information and services.
approach: Built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS for a responsive and modern front-end design.
challenges: Ensuring the site is visually appealing while being easy to navigate for users with various technical backgrounds.

description: A music web application that lets users explore, play, and interact with audio tracks.
requirements: Create an engaging UI for music lovers with authentication, audio controls, and payment integration.
approach: Built with React and backend powered by Express and MongoDB. Firebase handles authentication. Stripe used for payment.
challenges: Managing audio performance, user session persistence, and integration of payment gateways.

description: A local football academy website designed to provide details about training programs, and coaches.
requirements: Create a responsive website showcasing the football academy's offerings, including registration and program details.
approach: Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for a sleek and modern design, with easy navigation and interactive features.
challenges: Ensuring smooth navigation across pages, integrating a dynamic event schedule, and maintaining a responsive design.

description: A restaurant website for showcasing menus, restaurant details, and reservation features.
requirements: Build a fully functional restaurant website with an interactive menu, reservation system, and live updates.
approach: Developed with the MERN stack, Firebase for authentication, and deployed on Netlify, with a modern, responsive design.
challenges: Implementing a live reservation system and keeping the menu dynamically updated.

description: An online e-commerce platform for buying kids' toys, built with the MERN stack and Firebase.
requirements: Build a scalable e-commerce site with secure payment and product management.
approach: Responsive UI built with MERN stack, Firebase for authentication, deployed on Netlify.
challenges: Implementing secure payment and managing large product inventory state.

description: A responsive e-commerce platform with user authentication, product filtering, and payment system.
